Articles.Content: Why would you want to destroy towns in silence when they can hear you, you can make them flee and panic!!

That's what we say we think about as men. but it's close. It's probably more along the lines of:

EDIT: wait i just say the canadian flag patch...I didn't not post this with that knowledge.

I'm fine with the Canadian flag patch, even though I'm American (try to guess why for a cookie).
Because Canadians are less jingoistic?

1. I don't think that's a tank.

2. I'm happy I wasn't the only one who saw that.

I saw that too.

Because Canadians are less jingoistic?

WRONG! No cookie for you.

Why would you want to destroy towns in silence when they can hear you, you can make them flee and panic!!

Stealth attacks! The people would just wake up to find everyone else dead!
I suppose so but then why dont you tactical nuke it?

Because Canadians actually demonstrate intelligence every now and then?

My proper guess is going to be long anime hair.
Anime is always a reason to like things.
Everybody is wrong about my "guess why" thing. Somewhat answer: Most of my relatives live in Canada, and I am 75% Canadian/Northern European.

A anime version of everything is superior?

On-topic: Chobit, when will you take the Rollout and Failure images out of the WIP section?

I like Canada because Chobit and Trekkete live there.

Edit: Also what is your next idea for a pic?

Everybody is wrong about my "guess why" thing. Somewhat answer: Most of my relatives live in Canada, and I am 75% Canadian/Northern European.
Northern European?

Northern European?

Part English, part German, part Irish, part Scottish.
That's not northern Europe, that's Britain and Germany.
Once I paint up a new set of sketches and finish a few more for the current set I'll refresh the WIP page
Looking forwards to it

I like Canada because Chobit and Trekkete live there.

Edit: Also what is your next idea for a pic?

You, I like. Let's keep you around this place.

OnTopicEdit - I sohuld stop reading Star Trek fanfic and be working on PfL fic. But I shan't.

You, I like. Let's keep you around this place.

OnTopicEdit - I sohuld stop reading Star Trek fanfic and be working on PfL fic. But I shan't.

No. You will work on Pfl. because Kittensonturntables.gif says so.

No. You will work on Pfl. because Kittensonturntables.gif says so.

Actually, I'm counting this as research. Both for writing tech-talk and writing humour. Because it's hilarious.
How long have you had the website, I don't have internet at my house so I didn't notice until today.

Website's been around for a while, but it didn't start to really be used until a few months ago when there was an incident with images being inappropriate for this forum to display.

As for the off-topic posts related to art from someone else, that kind of thing really has no place in this thread. It constitutes off topic if posted here.

How long have you had the website, I don't have internet at my house so I didn't notice until today.

The websites been up for a while. Speaking of which, the mobile site is seriously lacking in updates.

I have removed more off-topic posts. Please do remember that this is not a chat thread and posts not relating to the discussion of OP's Fan Art will be removed without warning.

Further action may be taken in cases where off-topic posts repeatedly occur.
